transfer.description: Transfers tokens to a specified address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from a specified address to another address.

approve.description: Approves a spender to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of the owner.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with given parameters.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals the token uses.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of a specified address.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

delegate.description: Delegates voting power to a specified address.

delegateBySig.description: Delegates voting power to a specified address using a signature.

delegates.description: Returns the delegate address of a specified address.

getVotesAtBlock.description: Returns the number of votes a specified address had at a particular block.

checkpoints.description: Returns the checkpoints for a specified address.

numCheckpoints.description: Returns the number of checkpoints for a specified address.

taxHandler.description: Returns the address of the tax handler contract.

setTaxHandler.description: Sets a new tax handler contract address.

treasuryHandler.description: Returns the address of the treasury handler contract.

setTreasuryHandler.description: Sets a new treasury handler contract address.

owner.description: Returns the current owner of the contract.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

nonces.description: Returns the current nonce for a specified address.
